comments.author: I Am Dansker.7105
comments.body:
If the commander downloaded a program from you, then yes, you could see who is tagged. This is done using the GW2 Mumble api, that tells you if the current player on the machine that the software is installed, is a commander or not atm

Not sure this would fit your usecase though

comments.author: Aristekrat.6380
comments.body:
I would like to write a utility that analyzes the effectiveness of commanders in WVW and maybe catalogs some of the most devastating/potent runs over the week.

It doesn’t look like there’s any way to see who’s commanding though. If I missed it deep within the API docs please let me know. Otherwise, it’d be cool to have. All the info I need is already available except for who’s pinned…
